1.0.name: wordpress/adkingpro
1.0.description:
--

Stay up-to-date with the latest by following @kingproplugins on Twitter, KingProPlugins on Facebook or King Pro Plugins on Google+

--

Ad King Pro allows you to easily manage, track and report on your on-site advertising. Upload your banner/flash banner/adsense code/text, add the link its to go to then your ready to go. Set it to start and end at a certain time if needed. Ad King Pro can be placed into any page or post by using the shortcode. It can also be placed directly into theme files if need be. Create types and assign multiple banners to randomly show one on every page refresh, define a category to display in a specific spot, even define a particular ad to display. Want to show multiple on a single page, no probl
